story.text: It was a good day at work. Made progress on things that matter. Tensions are low. Kamila bought a ticket today and is officially coming.
We also made lots of progress on the social contract front - very difficult, but important stuff.
Also, made new friends at Tippet on Saturday that I think I forgot to mention.

Still listening to Geoffrey West's Scale. Fascinating book. One nugget - we must innovate infinitely faster as our growth continues. Also, most systems scale sub-linearly, except Cities - we need to change that.
Great evening with Kerr. Love her. And rhyming.
